about_the_game:
Welcome to Hotel Goetia. A mansion shrouded in mystery that even the locals won't come near! In this lighthearted game of cat and mouse, prepare to be chased around every corner by an unlikely antagonist – an adorable yet relentless maid! Only she isn't your typical human and isn't about to let you cause trouble in her workplace!

Uncover the mansion's dark past, reveal hidden secrets, and get to the bottom of what really happened at Hotel Goetia. Delve into a captivating story filled with twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Will you survive the the dangers or become another permanent ghostly resident?

Features:

- Charming stylized anime graphics
- Multiple endings and playable characters.
- Enemies that exhibit advanced decision-making skills and react to your actions.
- Explore a mysterious mansion, brimming with atmospheric details and many secrets to uncover that will allow you to piece together past events.
- Play in first person or third person
- Cooking and potion making

content_descriptors.notes: Some light cartoon-ish violence and some light nudity (seeing a woman's underwear by accident). Some profanities too.

name: You've been ReMaid!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD R7 265 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Run for your life as you try to survive the night while being stalked by a cute maid who is dead set on teaching you some manners. Uncover secrets, outsmart your enemies, and embrace the absurd. Will you make it through the night?
